doc.title: No Umbrella: Election Day in the City
doc.plot: "NO UMBRELLA - ELECTION DAY IN THE CITY" is an unblinking look at the 2004 Election Day failures in one of Ohio's poorest neighborhoods. In the most hotly contested state in the country, gridlock at inner city polls ignites tempers and sets off charges of conspiracy. "NO UMBRELLA" drops us squarely into the chaos. We watch the irascible octogenarian councilwoman Ms. Fannie Lewis as she takes on polling place breakdowns, an unresponsive bureaucracy and an increasingly agitated electorate.
